title: Naturopathy vs Aromatherapy - What's the difference?
description: As nouns the difference between naturopathy and aromatherapy is that naturopathy is (alternative medicine) a system of therapy that avoids drugs and surgery and emphasizes the use of natural remedies (air, water, heat, sunshine) and physical means (massage, electrical treatment) to treat illness while aromatherapy is...
